name: root-fossil
effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a lileep.
short_effect: Can be revived into a Lileep.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A fossil of an
ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A fossil of an
ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A fossil of an ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be
part of a plant root.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a plant root.

that once lived in the sea. It looks as
if it could be part of a plant’s root.
